website_summaries.verdict: Design of the helmet helps to disperse the force of an impact from a foul tipped baseball.
pros: Finish on the helmet is a rubberized matte that's available in two different colors, and both options will look great
Well-placed air vents throughout the helmet help the player to remain cooler
Steel mask extends into the chin area for extra protection
cons: Snaps on the helmet are tough to buckle
Back segment may dig into the neck of smaller players

customer_reviews.title: protects the face
customer_reviews.text: Daughter uses this for 14u travel softball. so far it has lasted the spring/summer season as well as the summer/fall season (about 70 games or so as well as 50 to 60 practices). It still looks well, it is definitely used, but looks better than others I have seen. If you purchase it, as with everything periodically check the screws that hold the mask in place as they will loosen...lost one and had to go to the screw ben to find a replacement....then used lock-tight on each screw so as not to lose them again. Daughter likes it as it looks cool, but I like it as it protects the face and the expensive metal in her mouth
customer_reviews.author: kgso24

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, great helmet
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice helmet with durable inner padding. This is my team helmet for an 11U team used by what I would consider average size catchers. It fits them all perfectly. This helmet is basically the same helmet as the Easton Natural, Easton Stealth Speed, Combat, MacGregor Varsity, Louisville TPX and I'm sure plenty of others, with different stickers and grip finish. I'm assuming they are all made by the same company.
customer_reviews.author: CJB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Catchers Helmet for Little Leaguer
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a very tall 10 year old boy. He loves it. Very comfortable and well ventilated with good field of view. Flips off easy and the chin pad adjusts nicely and is very comfortable. Adjusts to size nicely in the back of the helmet. Seems very well made, feels sturdy. Little League requires a throat dangler which was not included with this. Might want to pick one up while ordering this if it's for a LLer
customer_reviews.author: Griff

customer_reviews.title: Loose screws
customer_reviews.text: Screws that hold the mask on come out very easily. My son lost two after first tournament. Another kid on team did as well. Amazon did not respond to my claim and neither did Easton. Luckily screws from old mask fit. Great mask just check the screws and tighten them up
customer_reviews.author: Lennon R. Jones II

customer_reviews.title: Strong helmet!
customer_reviews.text: My nine and 12 yr old both wear this helmet. It is comfortable, fits properly, and very protective. In little league you still need to order the throats guard to be compliant by rule.
customer_reviews.author: GGU

customer_reviews.title: Buttons in the back too tight - couldn't easily snap on and off and it cost a fortune ...
customer_reviews.text: Buttons in the back too tight - couldn't easily snap on and off and it cost a fortune to return. Find a helmet through Prime, even if you have to pay a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Cyd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect helmet for young players
customer_reviews.text: This catcher's helmet fit my 8yo perfectly. Unlike the Rawlings CFA2 which he has used before this helmet actually fits his head the way it should. The chin pad AND the forehead pads are in contact with his head when properly fitted. The CFA2 forehead pads do not touch his head or any of his teammates, no matter how much the straps are adjusted. The padding in this helmet is also far superior, the padding has channels that allows for much better airflow.
customer_reviews.author: SCI

customer_reviews.title: Good visibility but uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old uses this helmet for little league and travel baseball. It provides good protection and visibility, but the padding inside is hard and uncomfortable. Even after several months of use there is no give in the interior. He has to wear a knit cap or his baseball cap (backwards) under it. He really should not have to be wearing anything in addition to the helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa G

customer_reviews.title: Great mask, great value, happy son, happy father
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what we were looking for. My 12 year old loves to catch, but couldn't stand the hassle of tightening and loosening straps on the team mask. So, we bought him his own. Great purchase! I'd do it again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: JGRM

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet for the Dedicated Catcher
customer_reviews.text: My daughter plays for a high school and AAU softball team. Her old helmet wasn't designed for quick removal which is critical for certain plays like foul balls. This helmet has a four point support system that keeps the rear support element firmly against the back of the head while the helmet is removed. This prevents tangling with hair and glasses as is the case with my daughter. It's also very rugged. After spring and summer seasons in excess of 300 games and practices, it looks as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne A Lemmerhirt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect youth helmet
customer_reviews.text: This is the helmet you need for young catchers 8-10. Very light weight and very well built. My 8 year old daughter loves this helmet got it yesterday and caught one of her friends at pitching lessons last night with it.Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Tigerdad22

customer_reviews.title: Great youth helmet!
customer_reviews.text: Great Helmet. Bought to replace the Rawlings model where the interior pads became unglued after a couple of years. Better visiility and construction. Comfortable for my 9 year old son. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The lower padding in back caused irritation and needed to be trimmed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the second one we have purchased (lost the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we have purchased (lost the first one). My daughter loves it. Fits her big hair/head perfectly. She's 10.
customer_reviews.author: Keli E. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great Catcher's Mask -- Particularly for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This mask is a significant step up from the lower priced models. Its a great value and worth paying a bit extra for -- particularly when you can get it on Amazon at a discount.
customer_reviews.author: vardelda

customer_reviews.title: Sharp edge on the back
customer_reviews.text: The item has a design flaw. It has a sharp edge on the back that cuts into the neck when you take it off. My son didn't want to put it on again. And the seller deducts a restocking fee and shipping if you return it.
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and pro look. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cesar G.

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Nephew. The small can be considered youth size. He said the helmet fit great and looked great.
customer_reviews.author: TobycW

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice catchers helmet
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice catchers helmet. The padding is easy to remove and wash and is very comfortable and breathable. My 9 year old is big for his age and it fit perfectly when opening
customer_reviews.author: Scott T

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is well built and durable. My kid loves it and uses it almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: its just me

customer_reviews.title: Easton Rival Catcher's Helmet
customer_reviews.text: Strong, sturdy helmet. Fits as expected. Our son (7 years old) is very comfortable in this helmet. We are very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: maxxcody

customer_reviews.title: Great mask
customer_reviews.text: This mask has a great fit and look. My son loves it. Helmets normally run big on him but this fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Raymack21

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit, just make sure you tighten screws once a month.
customer_reviews.author: dalea  richardson

customer_reviews.title: Son has been catching since he was 4...wears it like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: 10 years of playing the game. He has commented that its easy to remove...flat black so it's easy to clean up...great keeps the fast ones from remodeling moms handywork!
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great for girl's softball
customer_reviews.text: I am a Varsity softball coach and this helmet has been the best one my team has had. It's durable, looks great, and is easy to throw off when needed. My girl's love it!
customer_reviews.author: Hartwig

customer_reviews.title: Great equipment.
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet! My son LOVES it and uses it every game.
customer_reviews.author: Francesco

customer_reviews.title: awsome
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this helmet of High school Softball, fitment is good, weight is good and light, comes in School colors.......
customer_reviews.author: Scott A. Kusamura

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you order your daughter a small and don't go by measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi L. Garman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for my daughter as I bought it as she travels for softball. Fits snug but comfortable. Extremely happy
customer_reviews.author: bobbi

customer_reviews.title: Great service and great product
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was thrilled for Christmas. Great service and great product.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Ickes

customer_reviews.title: Good Catcher's Helmut
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter who is a junior in high school. She likes it very much. Fits snugly but come off easily when going after popups. She says she gets a good view of the ball and feels well protected.
customer_reviews.author: Russell C.

customer_reviews.title: Great helment
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it!!!!! fits perfect a looks really cool. Easton is been in our familly for a long time....
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Good for braces/Herbst appliance
customer_reviews.text: My son has a Herbst appliance on his braces, which had two large hinges on his lower jaw. Most chin pads of masks grind right into that hardware, through his lower lip, making it impossible to wear the mask. This Mask has a different design of the chin pad, and is the only one we've found that he's able to wear. All other aspects of the helmet are great, and what you'd expect from Easton.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Rogers

product_meta.title: Easton Rival Catcher's Helmet
product_meta.description: The Easton Rival Grip Baseball Catchers Helmet protects your entire head with an impact-absorbent ABS plastic shell, multi-layer foam padding, and a steel facemask. It also never holds you back, thanks to its light weight, maximum ventilation, and ultimate visibility. Enhanced with a rubberized Grip matte finish for an unique feel, the Rival Grip is perfect for catchers young and old!
feature_bullets: ABS shell with strategically placed air vents for maximum ventilation and uncompromising protection
Multi-layer tech foams designed for impact dispersion and a comfortable fit, High-strength steel face mask protects without limiting field vision
